definition: horizontal/across/crosswise/horizontal stroke (in Chinese characters)/to place (sth) flat (on a surface)/to cross (a river, etc)/in a jumble/chaotic/(in fixed expressions) harsh and unreasonable/violent

sentences.english: They carried banners advocating religious freedom and sang “We Shall Overcome.”
sentences.chinese: 他們扛着橫幅主張宗教自由，還唱着“我們贏定了”。

sentences.english: "Save us", read a banner hung from one of the upper floor windows.
sentences.chinese: “救救我們”，較高樓層的窗戶上掛出這樣的橫幅。

sentences.english: Beside it, half buried in dirt, was a discarded banner.
sentences.chinese: 在它旁邊，一條丟棄的橫幅半埋於污泥中。
“再銷售”的橫幅，以促進我的網站。

sentences.english: For instance, you may like this portrait of Pat in a square format, or cropped to a horizontal.
sentences.chinese: 例如，你喜歡帕特的肖像爲方格式，或者裁成橫幅。

sentences.english: And we have certainly paid a price for not being more specific on that banner, " she noted.
sentences.chinese: 我們的確因爲那條橫幅標語不夠具體而付出了代價。

sentences.english: The marchers waved banners saying "WE NEED JOBS".
sentences.chinese: 示威人羣揮舞着“我們需要工作”的橫幅。

sentences.english: Banners with this slogan could be seen in almost every classroom。
sentences.chinese: 寫着這句標語的橫幅幾乎掛滿中國的每間教室。

sentences.english: There are so many streamers inscribed with slogans in both Chinese and English on the street.
sentences.chinese: 大街上有那麼多寫着中英文標語的橫幅。

sentences.english: Would you like a streamer and amplifier?
sentences.chinese: 你們要橫幅和擴音器嗎？

sentences.english: They were handing out handbills on the sidewalks. They were putting out banners and large posters.
sentences.chinese: 他們會在路旁派發傳單，同時還會掛上橫幅和大海報。

sentences.english: Avoid bold (JOIN NOW)text and obnoxious banners.
sentences.chinese: 避免加入一些大膽的文字和看了就令人厭惡的橫幅。

sentences.english: Welcome banners streched across the street .
The most precious is the right time inside the inter-column banner on the forehead.
sentences.chinese: 其中最爲珍貴的是右次間內柱前額上的橫幅。

sentences.english: Regardless of how deep you are in the site, that top banner is always there.
sentences.chinese: 無論您深入到站點的哪個部分中，頂部橫幅始終都在。

sentences.english: Can you read that banner from this distance?
sentences.chinese: 從這裏你能看清那個橫幅標語嗎？

definition: model or template character/written slogan or phrase/mention (e.g. "air mail" 航空 on a letter, "first draft" 初稿 on a document etc)
rhyming couplet/pair of lines of verse written vertically down the sides of a doorway/CL:副[fu4],幅[fu2]

pinyin: Zhong1 hua2 Ren2 min2 Gong4 he2 guo2

definition: to write a letter (to the authorities)/to present a petition
